entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bug in the Convert functions defined on various System.Text.Encoders #63592
  • [DllImportGenerator] Support marshalling unmanaged function pointer calls. #63590
  • XmlSerializer Behavior Change in .NET 6 #63585
  • Memory leak related to OptionsMonitor<LoggerFilterOptions> and Serilog #63578
  • Official Docker ASP.NET Core 1.1 runtime image #63573
  • [maccatalyst][arm64] Flaky test failure in CI : Failed to get bundle information #63572
  • DateOnly.AddX methods should be marked [Pure] #63570
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Create.UpdateAddFile #63562
  • [wasm] Update two debugger tests, as they are invalid now #63560

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Expose ProtectedMemory in ProtectedData extension #63589
  • Two root revocation tests failing on Windows #63245
  • Unable to load DLL 'libgdiplus': The specified module could not be found M1 mac #63135
  • NullabilityInfoContext does not report the correct nullability for method in generic base class. #63555
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not ignore delegate properties #62354
    6.0.x
  • Example when use XmlDsigXPathTransform alway validate fail #62206
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2]Etymology App failed to launch with error that Header's referrer is missing #63479
    7.0.0
  • Bug: DateTime.Now from .NET 6 will return UTC time, not local time in Ubuntu #63194
  • Runtime libraries: debug symbols missing for latest patches (5.0.13, 6.0.1) #62955
    7.0.0
  • Skip unnecessary RegexNode reductions in NonBacktracking mode #62681
    7.0.0
  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.21.56803 is missing from symbol servers. #62962
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] ArrayTests timing out on helix #62661
  • [API Proposal]: Platform-aware Marshal.StringToHGlobalUni equivalent #62475
  • Validate that no important Stream overrides are missing based on a systematic check #63191
  • coreclr.dll 5.0.13 symbols cannot be found #63190
  • [API Proposal]: Provide public OOB converters for System.Text.Json #63039
  • CA1416 incorrectly warning on LdapSessionOptions.SecureSocketLayer on Linux #62462
  • Question: How is the API diff made? #62356
  • Should there be more volatile in ConcurrentDictionary? #62972
  • system.composition.hosting.tests periodically failing on MacOS #63561
  • Improve code readability by using extention methods #63485
  • Loading `appsettings.json` with 600 lines of "data" is very slow in blazor wasm #62287
  • Blazor WASM app with Timers / Async code and ClientWebSocket results in increasing CPU utilisation. #62227
  • [wasm] Random tests failing with `main.js 384:18 Uncaught Error: Can't load ./dotnet.js` #62304
    7.0.0
  • Probably Task+WeakReference memory leak? Not sure #63568
  • Environment variable DOTNET_DbgEnableMiniDump=1 doens't work on linux #63218
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Tests not building on windows due to `PDB0021: Document name doesn't match any pattern in Source Link` #62892

PullRequests

Created

  • Set File Version Minor for System.Runtime.Experimental #63599
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix native frame unwind in syscall on arm64 for VS4Mac crash report. #63598
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Unify JIT/Methodical/eh/common and JIT/jit64/eh/common #63597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63596
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove ILStrip usage in mono for source-build #63593
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63591
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Arm64] Don't use D-copies in CopyBlock #63588
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ArgIterator::GetArgLoc by-ref check for HFAs/HVAs #63587
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use open StrongNameKeyId for ILVerification.dll #63583
    area-ILVerification
  • Special-case ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER in PosixSignalRegistration.Unregister #63582
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix case where we fail to commit the start of a new region. #63577
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Add getter properties unfolding in structures. #63574
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [TESTING CI] Compile crossgen2/ilc used in testing with NativeAOT #63571
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • improve protocol detection in jail #63565
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-freebsd
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugger follow up #63564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63514
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63520
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.2
  • improve TLS resume on server #63030
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • add RID for Alpine 3.15 #62938
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • disable lltng on FreeBSD #63567
    os-freebsd, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "Remove extra call to PropertyInfo.GetValue(object) (#60415)" #63586
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix hang in ArrayTests #63528
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0-maui] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63359
    area-Build-mono
  • Add a few missing Stream overrides #63579
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fixes Event Log Message Format on Unmanaged FailFast #63517
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change XmlAttributeCache.WriteValue(string) to assert #63364
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix Regex if-then-else code generation #63427
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix GENERIC_MATH_FEATURE by making sure we always choose the right ref #63525
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix Fiji time zone time conversion #63476
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 (#63482) #63576
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add AvxVnni support for NativeAOT #63563
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some trimming/AOT warnings in crossgen2/ilc #63569
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix paramName in CryptoStream ArgumentExceptions #63557
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63405
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Update CoreShim.cpp #63600
    test bug, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1545775 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix step on ios when using interpreter #63515
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    area-Build-mono
  • 'cmeq' and 'fcmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63519
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #62773
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • add capture group name in comment #63255
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • JIT: rework logic for when OSR imports method entry #63406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Shared physical file provider with base directory as root #63538
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [debugger] Fix reading a byte without checking the version of the Protocol #63503
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Implement the last of the approved cross platform hardware intrinsics, except shuffle #63414
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [draft] hot reload wip #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix index in XmlQueryRuntime.MatchesXmlType #63366
    area-System.Xml
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix ABI stress test coverage #63409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove leading and trailing white-spaces from section name #63549
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Delete some null checks #63024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove errors during first run of runpaltests.h #62642
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message (#62894) #63012
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix non-portable coreclr arm64 build #63121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Disable MemoryMappedFileTests failing on macOS/arm64 + coreclr due to too long path #63438
    area-System.IO
  • [mono] Convert RuntimeAssembly icalls to use QCallAssembly/ObjectHand… #63558
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Can we produce package artifacts #1792
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] what should be in __managed__Startup #1816
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] compiling for Linux #1797

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: ILScanner and Generics test #1783

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Wasm official job changes #1814
  • One more fix for official builds #1815

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] publish scenario for nativelib #1817

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK consistency improvements #23357
    7.0.1xx
  • SDK acquisition improvements #23356
    7.0.1xx
  • SDK workload improvements #23355
    7.0.1xx
  • On macOS, dotnet process seems to launch itself several times and maxes out CPU #23349
  • UseCommonOutputDirectory=true breaks CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies flag #23342

Closed

  • Solution build running for 18 min. after upgrade to Visual Studio 2022 17.0.0 Preview 3.0 and SDK 6.0.100-preview.7.21379.14 #19695
  • DOTNETSDK_WORKLOAD_MANIFEST_ROOTS pointing to workloads that are not lowercased fails #19994
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2] GlobalTool trx2junit install failed #23289

PullRequests

Created

  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23358
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Update man pages #23351
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update man pages #23350
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23347
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport System.CommandLine updates to 6.0.2xx #23345
    Area-CLI, 6.0.3xx

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542031 #23323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update old preview aka.ms link #23324
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update application insights version #22974
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ #23318
    Area-AspNetCore
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23336
    Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Add a way to inherit documentation <inheritdoc /> #313
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
  • Champion "params Span<T>" #1757
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Disable CS0436 by default #5528

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.InvalidCastException when using the newly introduced "Use Touple to Swap Values" in VS 17.1 to simplify usage of temp variable when swapping variables #58759
  • Negative Zero double value showing as zero in Locals and Watch Windows #58755
    Backlog
  • Out of stack exception in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll #58751
  • C# refactor "Create and assign property" does not add appropriate white spaces around the assignment operator '=' #58750
  • Stack Trace Explorer pops up unexpectedly #58746
  • AbstractSpellCheckCodeFixProvider depends on IDE completion options #58745

Closed

  • Applying EditorBrowsable attribute to property getters or setters does not work #58039
    Backlog
  • Invalid null-checked parameter syntax doesn't cause errors. #58585
    17.1
  • Has this kind of optimazation been done? #58749
  • Compiler crash when array access with from-end expression used in deconstruction assignment lowers to use a ref local and the right-hand side contains an await expression #58569
    17.1
  • Delegate types are only synthesized for lambdas with parameter types and return type that are valid type arguments #55217
    17.1
  • Test plan for "records" #40726
    17.1
  • Many compiler tests are flaky under Linux Environment #58719
  • VS2022 Release: Blazor doesn't show the helpers automatically in many occasions when underlined code from warnings #58002
    17.1
  • CodeAnalysis.ChangeNamespace ArgumentException #58372
    17.2.P1

PullRequests

Created

  • Additional #line span directive tests #58761
    Area-Compilers
  • Update CSharpUseTupleSwapCodeFixProvider for top-level statements #58760
    Area-IDE
  • Update language feature status #58758
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tests for #37309 and #58472 #58752
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Move reading HideAdvancedMembers option up #58747
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Required modifier parsing #58431
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Move CSharp/Test/Emit/Attributes to Emit2 #58754
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1545084 #58753
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58756
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58729
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58703
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • SpillSequenceSpiller.Spill - ensure sequences under ref assignments are spilled. #58657
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Remove IntelliCodeCompletionOptions #58748
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cleanup old workaround for arcadesdk #45105
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Don't crash when default namespace isn't a valid name #58704
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58762
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid cyclic references during incremental project update #58720
    Area-IDE
  • Null annotate ParameterSymbol and derived #58700
    Area-Compilers
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers, Feature - Param Null Checking
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Fix foreach deconstruction nullability #52722
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Suggest parameter names from matching overloads #52801
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Integration test options #58744
    Area-IDE
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove contract check to avoid crash #58675
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Fix code generation to add default constraint when needed #53318
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Force the spill sequence rewriter to spill the receiver for interpolated string handlers #58722
    Area-Compilers
  • Better parse when lambda expressions contain default parameter values. #58690
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate moving MVC Attributes from `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc` namespace to `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http` namespace #39425
    .NET 7 Planning
  • UseForwardedHeaders should not manipulate headers #39423
  • Razor non-nullable Parameter with EditorRequired attribute still produces CS8618 warning #39418
  • New project "The remote party closed the Web Socket connection without completing the Close Handshake" #39413
  • Make it simpler for customers to investigate Blazor Auth issues #39412
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] Disconnect alternative proposal #39409
    .NET 7 Planning
  • the runtime compilation of Razor Class Library is not working correctly at dotnet 6.0 #39404
    6.0.x
  • Blazor WASM AADB2C template fetchdata failed due to The issuer '(null)' is invalid #39401
    Backlog
  • [Feature request] [blazor] :Smarter value initialization for blazor's lifecycle #39400
  • HttpMethodMatcherPolicy.ApplyAsync ArgumentNullException #39398
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Create BlazorWebAssemblyApp 5.0/3.1 project in M1 machine and use the command "dotnet run", meet error:"Unhandled exception". #39397
  • Why CascadingValue doesn't supported custom comparer? #39396
  • On M1 machine, build 5.0 / 3.1 Grpc project show an error: Google.Protobuf.Tools cannot determine host OS and CPU". #39394

Closed

  • Test failure: `StatusCode204StopsLongPollingTriggersOnClosed` #35684
    Test failures
  • Retargeting from 6.0 to 7.0, can't run Angular/React ~ individual auth with error:Could not load type 'System.Security.Cryptography.RSA' #39342
  • SignalR use old cookie after user logged in. #39180
  • First Class Authorization and Token Management Support #38268
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #39399
  • [API Review] Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38573
    7.0-preview1
  • Logout does not work properly after refreshing the page if Auth0 is used #39339
  • Can't configure windows authentication on the new angular SpaProxy #39061
  • Error retrieving the current token in a Blazor application after successful authentication in Azure B2C with Msal #39311
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results.File() fails to determine the correct file size of symlinks #39170
    7.0-preview1
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2] Web page shows an unhandled exception while executing the request after Blazor.Polyfill launch #39343
  • Blazor WebAssembly prerendered root component types may get trimmed away in the client build #35461
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM SEO issues #39137
  • Flaky test: RendersAuthorizingUntilAuthorizationCompletedAsync #31854
    7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyTests.ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #38931
    Test failures
  • Perf regression: https, json #39392

PullRequests

Created

  • Unquarantine Http3 Tests #39424
    area-runtime
  • Update Windows 10 SDK to 22000. #39422
    community-contribution
  • [WIP] ANCM + Arm64 + helix #39420
    area-infrastructure
  • Refactor (WebJS) - Fix some ESLint warnings #39408
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Detect HTTP/2 connection sent to HTTP/1.1 endpoint #39402
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Fix UrlGroup UnregisteringPrefix log message #39419
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Clean up files created during tests #39415
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid declaring RazorPage<T>.Model as nullable by default (#39332) #39416
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.2
  • Add arm64 tools to vs json files #39417
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.22060.1 #39414

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-10
entry.content:

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Average_Grouped_from_LINQ_101 is non-deterministic #27155
  • Reverse_in_subquery_via_pushdown is non-deterministic #27152
  • Join same table twice, INNER JOIN instead of LEFT JOIN #27151
  • Consider removing the CAST to BIT for boolean literal values #27150
  • EF Core does not populate subcollections in foreign key relationships in many to many tables #27149
  • No noticeable benefit to Sqlite Pooled connections when using an encrypted database #27148

Closed

  • StackOverflowException in nested GroupBy query #27094
    6.0.2
  • GroupBy with outer reference not translating properly, causing data loss #27102
    6.0.2
  • Generated JOIN for multiple MIN is wrong #27083
    6.0.2
  • EF 6.0.0 and 6.0.1: sub-lists are no longer loaded #27105
    6.0.2
  • MigrationBuilder.InsertData does not use default schema anymore #27100
    7.0.0
  • NpgsqlTsVector.Matches() does not honour the TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION #27146
  • Eliminate reflection for ef core #27156
  • EnsureCreated throws "The requested configuration is not stored in the read-optimized model" after version update #27063
  • EFCore.SqlServer 6.0.1 Untrusted certificate authority error #27062
  • Proxies using Records with a base class broken since .NET 6 #26602
    6.0.2
  • Did the naming convention change for HasCheckConstraint in v.6? Is this a breaking change? #27059
    6.0.2

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27159
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.4 to 8.0.5 #27157
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Query: Assign proper type to CollectionResultExpression #27134
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Query: Avoid stackoverflow in lifting group by aggregate term #27131
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Query: Update column expression correctly when lifting joins from group by aggregate subquery #27109
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Lift GroupByAggregate when correlation predicate matches #27108
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27158
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Use the default schema for migration data operations. #27143
  • Remove quirk for #27059 #27147
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27144
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Remove quirk for #26602 #27140
